title: THE ESSENTIAL KOTLIN PROGRAMMING COURSE (ANDROID DEVELOPERS)
desc: Students will learn all aspects of the Kotlin Programming Language.  They will also understand how to apply this knowledge to more effectively write Android applications. This class does not focus on the server side programming aspects of Kotlin.  This class focuses on the Kotlin Programming Language and the advantages of using Kotlin when writing Android applications.  You will learn how to effectively use this language to make programming fun and interesting in Android. I will cover every concept in the Kotlin language and show you how to write some interesting applications in Android using this language (code alongs).  This course is a deep dive into the Kotlin language, it does not just cover the basics.  By the end of this course you will fully understand the Kotlin langauge and how to use it to write Android applications.If you have previously used Kotlin on an Android platform, I’m sure this course will deepen your understanding of it. If you have never used it, no problem, you will see that it can help you become a more efficient Android developer.Throughout the course, you can always contact me personally to get help when you’re stuck. I check the discussions regularly to help you at every step along the way.Lastly, this course is constantly updated and refined based on student feedback. I really appreciate each and every of my students so I listen to your feedback and act on it.Who is the target audience?This course is for anyone who would like to fully understand the concepts of the Kotlin Programming LanguageThis course is for anyone who would like to create android mobile applications using the Kotlin Programming Language

title: Smart Phone App Utilizing Remote Sensor For Input
desc: I need 2 sets of interacting s/w.S/w set 1 - I need s/w to read remote sensor data and transmit calculated data to a smart phone app.  This s/w must allow for initial setup (calibration) utilizing tune able user input.  The s/w must also allow tune able input in the loop for testing purposes.  I will provide all equations, but the variables must be tuneable or map based.  The s/w must also turn on and off a set of LEDs locally at sensor based on output of provided equations.S/w set 2 - I need an app that can receive OTA data from s/w set 1 and provide output as follows.Numerous selectable categories that have organized data from the sensors as I will later describe in detail.  The s/w will track data providing emails and / or text messages to user.  This app must have a sleek GUI allowing for a quick understanding of the status of the sensor from s/w set 1.  This app will also need to ability to provide data to other already established apps.I prefer Arduino code for the sensor s/w as it is easy for me to modify but am open to others if they are more robust and simple to modify.Assuming we reach an agreement, the contractor must sign an NDA and NCA.  Assuming this project is successful and I am happy with the service, I have many more needs for s/w and app development.

title: Talk app using landline Minutes
desc: id like the same setup app as below:[url removed, login to view]With the Talk2Go app, all TalkTalk customers can make and receive calls whilst out and about on 3G or 4G mobile data or over Wi-Fi.These calls are charged at the same rate as if the consumer is at home using their landline.This means that if their home broadband deal includes anytime minutes, mobile calls made to UK numbers via Talk2Go will be free of charge.Talk2Go also includes a 'Follow Me' feature which transfers calls from a customer’s landline to their mobile.Customers can pair their TalkTalk landline with up to four mobile devices.Tristia Harrison of TalkTalk, said: "We’re always looking for new ways to help keep bills low and Talk2Go is a brilliant little app that does just that."A lot of people may have a landline package they’re not necessarily making the most of; we want to help everyone get the best value from their calling plans."She said Talk2Go is "a great way" of making landline minutes go a little further.Ms Harrison said this means customers never have to miss a call to their landline again."It cuts the cost of mobile calls and helps families stay in touch without racking up big bills," she stated.
